nodes.text: The spig was a type of dance. During a party on Vector Day organized at the Boulderdash by the Quenk jazz artist Mrp-Mrp Poo, vacuum salesman Gall Supreme danced the spig with one of Tireis Blackandwhite's two segments.

The "spig" was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
